Template.TextPart:
Hi {{name}},

Welcome to BeatStake, the premier platform for music lovers and creators! We're thrilled to have you on board.

As a new member, you can now explore and invest in your favorite music, connect with artists, and much more.

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to our support team at support@beatstake.com.

Happy exploring!

Best regards,
The BeatStake Team
Template.HtmlPart:
Welcome to BeatStake, {{name}}!

Hi {{name}},

Welcome to BeatStake, the premier platform for music lovers and creators! We're thrilled to have you on board.

As a new member, you can now explore and invest in your favorite music, connect with artists, and much more.

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to our support team at support@beatstake.com.

Happy exploring!

Best regards,
The BeatStake Team
